title: Mediterranean Veggie & Halloumi Wrap
short_description: Grilled halloumi and roasted vegetables with a tangy tzatziki sauce in a warm wrap.

instructions.step: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss bell peppers, zucchini, and red onion with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast for 20 minutes.
While veggies roast, prepare tzatziki: mix Greek yogurt, grated cucumber, lemon juice, minced garlic, and chopped dill.
Slice halloumi and grill or pan-fry until golden brown on both sides.
Assemble wraps: spread tzatziki, add roasted veggies and grilled halloumi.
